about_the_game:
"Femdom Wife Game - Zoe" delivers a story about your vanilla partner turning dominant.

Taking place in a 3D realtime and fully animated game, this femdom game transcribes erotic novelas in its own way. The game has a strong focus on femdom content, such as pussy worship, cuckolding, chastity, foot fetish, etc.

The game includes the following content:

  • Chastity
  • Cum eating
  • Pegging
  • Foot worship
  • Pussy worship
  • Feminization
  • Cuckolding (can be disabled in the settings)

The relationship between you and Zoe is a balance of power. Not everything is to your liking, but Zoe still wants to try new things. Zoe will react to your behavior and will evolve based on your preferences.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains consensual BDSM, nakedness and uncensored animated sex scenes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bits OS
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bits OS
  • Processor: 3 GHz equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 3GB/AMD Radeon R9 290X 4GB or equivalent

short_description: "Femdom Wife Game - Zoe" is a relationship simulator. Zoe, your partner, has grown tired of your sex life and wants to try new things. Only she wants to be the one in charge. The game offers both authenticity and immersion. Start your new life with Zoe!
